Whoa!!! Hello!!!!!!


My name is Alexandria but most people call me Lexie, this is my little 'hub' where I have my links and projects and all such things.

I primarily make games, and most things I make are related to that. You can find all of that to the right under 'workz' and more about me here!

My non-work related hobbies include Gunpla: Qubeley is my favourite and so far I've managed to find the HG, HG Mk.2, and MG kits! Besides that I like to paint miniatures, currently warhammer, and do crafts of all sorts.
Recently I got into clothing customization (fucking around with bleach), and soon I hope to be able to mess around with leatherworking!

My current goal is to make and get a home NAS working with my partner, so we can store and watch our [LEGALLY ACQUIRED] media! Among other things such as hosting things, like a peertube instance, and maybe even this website!

Feel free to reach out thru my socials or add me on pisscorp!

BREAKING NEWS: Local cuppydog has been sighted eating an aluminum can, more on this story at 9 | 500 burglar clowns have been apprehended in what has been dubbed "The Greatest Traffic Stop" |
